p: Perillaldehyde (( S)-4-(1-methylethyl)-1-cyclohexene-1-carboxaldehyde) ( Figure 11) is a volatile monoterpene, the main component of the essential oil of Perilla frutescens leaves. It has biological activities such as vasodilator [ 99], anti-inflammatory and antidepressant [ 100], and antifungal [ 101].
